short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PasswordSequre: Securely Store & Auto-Fill Your Passwords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of remembering multiple passwords? Password Manager is here to help! With this secure and user-friendly extension, you can safely store all your passwords, generate strong passwords, and auto-fill login details with just a few clicks.
